price: (199) Take what is given freely,[434] enjoin what is good, and turn away from the ignorant.
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
footnotes: [434]- From the dispositions of men or from their wealth.  In other words, be easy in dealing with them and avoid causing them difficulty.
